game.name: Extreme Way
game.description:
The best action packed world is waiting for you! The time is very beautiful when the moon has made its entry and the sun has set and all people living in the city is going to asleep. Amidst this wonderful environment, you will see a cute ninja covered with the needful weapons who are looking forward to run across the rooftops of different buildings. You have to play the role of a brave ninja who knows well how to overcome a horde of enemies. Are you ready to accept this challenge? Join Extreme Way and be prepared to assist this warrior to go through a bunch of obstacles!
It will be challenging enough as running regularly will be the only method to spot the way towards the ultimate win in this brand new fighting game. Make sure to help the character of the game to run, jump and destroy walls perfectly on his way. This brave warrior is known for sneaking, smashing and dashing. He has kept running during his entire life as he thinks that regularly running will keep his heart healthy and improve his overall stamina. 
Jump over some towers and smash some walls and other enemies which try to stop him from running on his way in this one of the best ninja runner games! Jump over the rooftops with the arrow keys or tapping the screen! Slash out with your katana using the Space Bar and destroy any errant chimneys. We are many more cool HTML5 free action games for kids which you play on any of your favorite device. Our mobile fight games can help relieve you from the boring hours in just a few minutes.

game.webControlKeys: SPACE/ LEFT CLICK OF MOUSE TO JUMP AND HIT
